snippet.textDisplay: I've read this game runs horribly on the PC no matter how good your rig is. I'd wait until that patch comes out that is supposed to stabilize the frame rate and eliminate other glitches. This game seems to run better currently on the PS4.
snippet.textOriginal: I've read this game runs horribly on the PC no matter how good your rig is. I'd wait until that patch comes out that is supposed to stabilize the frame rate and eliminate other glitches. This game seems to run better currently on the PS4.

snippet.textDisplay: I know this game is probably far from perfect, but I'm really curious to play it, especially on my new powerful PC. From the impressions I've read, most of the people who bought the game are liking it, some even saying it's their GOTY so far. The whole online aspect with the invasions and the hacking seems entertaining. I was very pleasantly surprised to discover this game has an electronic/sci-fi soundtrack, the good kind. This ambient theme in particular is very good, it reminds me of the better tracks in the Mass Effect series, mostly found in ME1. I can get lost in this theme.

This ambient theme in particular is very good, it reminds me of the better tracks in the Mass Effect series, mostly found in ME1. I can get lost in this theme.

snippet.textDisplay:
I really liked the initial premise of the game, but the story is so bad, even for video game standards. And I absolutely despise the main character.
The gameplay itself is pretty fun though, it's still far from being GTA, but I don't think they even tried to compete with that game.
All in all, enjoyable, but definitely not worth the hype. I recommend playing Mario Kart instead.
snippet.textOriginal:

The gameplay itself is pretty fun though, it's still far from being GTA, but I don't think they even tried to compete with that game.
All in all, enjoyable, but definitely not worth the hype. I recommend playing Mario Kart instead.

snippet.textDisplay: Honestly, it's a great game that's met all my expectations. The story starts off a little blandish but gets progressively engaging, the driving feels legitimate and realistic, the combat is also a lot of fun and there are plenty of guns and hacks to obtain. Just don't dive into it expecting it to play like GTA, Sleeping Dogs, or some other sandbox game. It's its own game entirely.
snippet.textOriginal: Honestly, it's a great game that's met all my expectations. The story starts off a little blandish but gets progressively engaging, the driving feels legitimate and realistic, the combat is also a lot of fun and there are plenty of guns and hacks to obtain. Just don't dive into it expecting it to play like GTA, Sleeping Dogs, or some other sandbox game. It's its own game entirely.
